taskGroup.name: A worked example in ASSET

intro.b: The series of cheat sheets will get you running with your first use of ASSET. ASSET is an MWC integrated modelling environment that provides tools to design, execute, and analyse tactical simulations.

taskGroup.onCompletion: Well done, you've completed the cheat sheets. If you're interested in learning more about ASSET, investigate the ASSET Modelling Guide in the online help.

intro.b: Unfortunately there's a little house-keeping to be done before you dive in to ASSET. These steps will lead you through getting ready.

onCompletion.b: Right, now you're ready for action. Let's move on

intro.b: The first data file we're going to create is the scenario. This is the file that describes the participants and their environment.

onCompletion.b: That's the scenario complete. The next item of interest is the control file

intro.b: The control file contains the instructions for how ASSET should run a scenario

onCompletion.b: We now have a description of how our target scenario is to be executed

intro.b: Now that our data is defined, it's time to actually perform some simulation

onCompletion.b: Right, we've successfully executed a simulation, and produced some results files.

onCompletion.b: That's the conduct simple simulations completed.
